name: Siriusmon
effect:
[Hand] [Counter] ＜Blast Digivolve＞ (Your Digimon may digivolve into this card without paying the cost).[
[On Play] [When Digivolving] You may place 1 Digimon card with [Gammamon] in its text from your hand at the bottom of this Digimon’s digivolution cards. Then, delete 1 of your opponent’s Digimon with 8000 DP or less. For each color in this Digimon’s digivolution cards, add 1000 to the maximum this DP-based deletion effect can delete.
[All Turns] [Once Per Turn] When a Digimon is deleted, gain 1 memory.
aceEffect: Overflow ＜-4＞ (When this card is sent from battle area or under your card to another area, lose 4 memory).

name: Jellymon
effect: [Start of Your Main Phase] If you have 7 or less cards in your hand ＜Draw 1＞ (Draw 1 card from your deck).
digivolveEffect: [When Attacking] If you have 7 or less cards in your hand ＜Draw 1＞ (Draw 1 card from your deck).

name: TeslaJellymon
effect: [When Attacking] By trashing 1 blue card from your hand, this Digimon can't be deleted in battle until the end of the turn.
digivolveEffect: [When Attacking] If you have 7 or less cards in your hand ＜Draw 1＞ (Draw 1 card from your deck).

name: Thetismon
effect: [On Play] [When Digivolving] By trashing 2 blue cards from your hand, unsuspend 1 of your Digimon and 1 of your [Kiyoshiro Higashimitarai] and this Digimon gains ＜Blocker＞ (At blocker timing, by suspending this Digimon, it becomes the attack target) until the end of your opponent's turn.
digivolveEffect: [All Turns] [Once Per Turn] When you trash a card with [Jellymon] in its text from your hand, unsuspend this Digimon.

name: Amphimon
effect:
[Hand] [Counter] ＜Blast Digivolve＞ (Your Digimon may digivolve into this card without paying the cost)
[On Play] [When Digivolving] You may trash up to 4 blue cards in your hand. For each card trashed by this effect, trash 1 card from the bottom of 1 of your opponent's Digimon or Tamers. Then, return 1 of your opponent's Digimon or Tamers with no cards under it to its owner's hand.
[When Attacking] By returning 3 cards with [Jellymon] in their text from your trash to the bottom of your deck, this Digimon gains ＜Security Attack +1＞ (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card) for the turn.
aceEffect: Overflow ＜-4＞ (When this card is sent from battle area or under your card to another area, lose 4 memory).

name: Cthyllamon
effect:
[Trash] [Main] By returning 1 of your Tamers to bottom of your deck, play this card, reducing its cost by the returned card's play cost.
[On Play] [When Digivolving] Trash the bottom 3 digivolution from 1 of your opponent's Digimon. Then, until the end of your opponent's turn, all of your opponent's Digimon with no digivolution cards can't attack.

name: Publimon
effect:
[Security] At the end of the battle, play this card without paying the cost.
[End of Attack] Place this card on top of your security stack.

name: Angoramon
effect: [Start of Your Main Phase] If you have a Tamer, gain 1 memory.
digivolveEffect: [Your Turn] While this Digimon has [Angoramon] in its text, it gets +2000 DP.

name: Airdramon
effect:
[Your Turn] When a card with [Angoramon] in its text would be played or when your Digimon would digivolve into a Digimon card with [Angoramon] in its text, by suspending this Digimon, reduce the cost by 2.
[Your Turn] When this Digimon becomes suspended, 1 of your Digimon with [Angoramon] in its text gains ＜Rush＞ (This Digimon can attack the turn it comes into play) for the turn.

name: Chamblemon
effect:
[On Play] Suspend 1 Tamer. Until the end of your opponent's turn, your opponent's Tamers can't unsuspend.
[All Turns] This Digimon gets +1000 DP for each suspended Tamer in play.

name: SymbareAngoramon
effect: [On Play] [When Digivolving] Suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon. Then, if your opponent has no unsuspended Digimon, 1 of your Digimon gains ＜Blocker＞ (At blocker timing, by suspending this Digimon, it becomes the attack target) until the end of your opponent's turn.
digivolveEffect: [Your Turn] While this Digimon has [Angoramon] in its text, it gets +2000 DP.

name: Lamortmon
effect: [On Play] [When Digivolving] Suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon. Then, if your opponent has no unsuspended Digimon, 1 of your opponent's Digimon can't unsuspend until the end of your opponent's turn.
digivolveEffect: [All Turns] [Once Per Turn] When a Digimon with [Angoramon] in its text deletes an opponent's Digimon in battle, trash the top card of your opponent's security stack.

name: Diarbbitmon
effect:
[Hand] [Counter] ＜Blast Digivolve＞ (Your Digimon may digivolve into this card without paying the cost)
[On Play] [When Digivolving] Suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon. Then, if your opponent has no unsuspended Digimon, gain 2 memory.
[When Attacking] You may play 1 Digimon card with [Angoramon] in its text from your hand without paying the cost. Return the Digimon played by this effect to your hand at the end of the turn.
aceEffect: Overflow ＜-4＞ (When this card is sent from battle area or under your card to another area, lose 4 memory).

name: Espimon
effect: [On Play] Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Add 1 card with ＜Blocker＞ (At blocker timing, by suspending this Digimon, it becomes the attack target) or 1 Tamer card to your hand. Place the rest at the bottom of your deck.
digivolveEffect: [Opponent's Turn] [Once Per Turn] When an attack target is switched, ＜Draw 1＞ (Draw 1 card from your deck).

name: Ryudamon
effect: [When Attacking] If you have a Tamer, this Digimon may digivolve into [Ginryumon] from your hand without paying the cost.
digivolveEffect: [Your Turn] While this Digimon has the [X Antibody] trait trait, it gets +1000 DP.

name: Gammamon
effect: [All Turns] [Once Per Turn] When one of your other Digimon is deleted by an effect, this Digimon may digivolve into a Digimon card with [Gammamon] in its text from your trash without paying the cost.
digivolveEffect: [On Deletion] You may play 1 [Hiro Amanokawa] from your hand without paying the cost.

name: Regulusmon
effect:
[Hand] [Counter] ＜Blast Digivolve＞ (Your Digimon may digivolve into this card without paying the cost)
[On Play] [When Digivolving] Trash 1 card in your hand. Then, you may place 1 Digimon card with [Gammamon] in its text from your trash as this Digimon's bottom digivolution card.
[All Turns] [Once Per Turn] When one of your effects places a digivolution card under this Digimon, by deleting 1 level 4 or lower Digimon, you may play 1 level 4 or lower Digimon card from your trash without paying the cost.
aceEffect: Overflow ＜-3＞ (When this card is sent from battle area or under your card to another area, lose 3 memory).

name: Gyuukimon
effect:
[On Play] Delete 1 level 4 or lower Digimon. If you do, you may play 1 [Gyuukimon] Token without paying its memory cost
(Digimon ・ Purple ・ Cost 7 ・ Level 5 ・ 3000 DP ・ Ultimate ・ Virus ・ Dark Animal).

name: Bokomon
effect:
[On Play] Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Add 1 card with [Gammamon] in its text among them to your hand. Place the rest at the bottom of your deck.
[All Turns] When your Digimon with [Gammamon] in its text other than [Bokomon] would leave the battle area other than by one of your effects, you may delete this Digimon to prevent it from leaving play.

name: Quantumon
effect:
[When Digivolving] By placing 1 Digimon at the top of its owner's security stack, reveal all cards in your opponent's security stack, and place 1 card among them at the top of their deck. Then, shuffle the rest and return it to the security stack.
[Start of Opponent's Turn] Declare 1 card category. Then, reveal the top card of your opponent's deck. If the card is of the declared category, this Digimon can't be affected by effects of cards of the declared card category for the turn. Return the revealed card to the top or bottom of your opponent's deck.
